text: Jakob Bothe (born Jakob Michelsen; 8 October 1964 - 17 January 2013), better known as Jakob Arjouni, was a German writer. He received the 1992 German Crime Fiction Prize for One Man, One Murder. He was born in Frankfurt, Hesse, West Germany. Arjouni died from pancreatic cancer on 17 January 2013 in Berlin, Germany. He was 48 years old. He was outlived by his wife and children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Science fiction writers Category:Writers from Frankfurt
title: Jakob Arjouni
